mapper.sql: order_id, passenger_property, passenger, passenger_sex, passenger_phone, flight_number, creation_date, transport_time, departure, intermediate_port, destination, car_type, driver_information, driver_base, passenger_price, parking_fees, toll_fees, points, note, order_status, expire_time, refuse_reason, driver_phone_number

select order_id, passenger_property, passenger, passenger_sex, passenger_phone, flight_number, creation_date, transport_time, departure, intermediate_port, destination, car_type, driver_information, driver_base, passenger_price, parking_fees, toll_fees, points, note, order_status, expire_time, refuse_reason, driver_phone_number from YDOnlineTaxi.order_information
mapper.insert:
insert into YDOnlineTaxi.order_information
order_id, passenger_property, passenger, passenger_sex, passenger_phone, flight_number, creation_date, transport_time, departure, intermediate_port, destination, car_type, driver_information, driver_base, passenger_price, parking_fees, toll_fees, points, note, order_status, expire_time, refuse_reason, driver_phone_number,
#{orderId}, #{passengerProperty}, #{passenger}, #{passengerSex}, #{passengerPhone}, #{flightNumber}, #{creationDate}, #{transportTime}, #{departure}, #{intermediatePort}, #{destination}, #{carType}, #{driverInformation}, #{driverBase}, #{passengerPrice}, #{parkingFees}, #{tollFees}, #{points}, #{note}, #{orderStatus}, #{expireTime}, #{refuseReason}, #{driverPhoneNumber},
mapper.delete:
delete from YDOnlineTaxi.order_information where order_id in
#{orderId}
mapper.select:
select
from YDOnlineTaxi.order_information where order_id=#{orderId} and DATE_FORMAT(transport_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{minTransportTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') and DATE_FORMAT(transport_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{maxTransportTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')

select
from YDOnlineTaxi.order_information
( driver_phone_number = #{driverPhoneNumber}
and DATE_FORMAT(transport_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{minTransportTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and DATE_FORMAT(transport_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{maxTransportTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ) and ( order_status like concat('%', #{likeOrderStatus1}, '%') or order_status like concat('%', #{likeOrderStatus2}, '%') or order_status like concat('%', #{likeOrderStatus3}, '%') or order_status like concat('%', #{likeOrderStatus4}, '%') )

select
from YDOnlineTaxi.order_information
driver_phone_number = #{driverPhoneNumber}
and DATE_FORMAT(transport_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{minTransportTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and DATE_FORMAT(transport_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{maxTransportTime},'%Y-%m-%d%H:%i:%s')
